name: Magic Pool Party
description:
It's party time! Let's throw some balls around through magical beam made by magicians hired by parents! What could possibly go wrong? *

Enjoy this game for two (or four) players and destroy your opponent! Controls:
> Left Stick > Move
> Right Stick > Aim
> Right Trigger > Shoot
PS4 and Xone pads supported!

Game entry for HGJ2018, theme: "Butterfly Effect".

Creators:
Piotr Stoch
Adam Jański
Michał Ertner
Aleksandra Dyszewska
Grzegorz Wierzejski

* Magic beam lets ball pass through it and bounces it at the same time. It duplicates every ball that is thrown at it. Combined with enviroment bouncing elements allows you to generate nearly infinite stream of balls aimed at your opponent from a single ball in your hands!
